item.title: WH Appeals to Supreme Court on 'Pay-or-Else' USAID Order
item.description: President Donald Trump's efforts to cut free foreign aid is seeking for a boost from the Supreme Court.

item.title: Poll Shows Trump Gaining Support Among Gen Z

item.title: Sen. Young: Want to Support Trump After Opposing Him
item.description: Sen. Todd Young, R-Ind., opposed President Donald Trump when he ran for the job, but now that he's in the White House, Young wants to work with him.

item.title: Ukraine's Osadchuck to Newsmax: Zelenskyy Has Ukraine's Support
